title: Typophile | Typographic Collaboration
content:
## [Japanese Hand Bindery Work](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515231751/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45384 "Japanese Hand Bindery Work")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515231751im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/05_4397.14.08.jpg)

Go to my Wordpress blog to read about the 175 engraved and hand bound booklets we are making in the Japanese accordion style:

[http://nancysharoncollinsstationer.wordpress.com/2008/05/15/47/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515231751/http:/nancysharoncollinsstationer.wordpress.com/2008/05/15/47/)
author: nancy sharon collins
